PETIT GRIS DE RENNES
me61
Smallish, 400-600 g in weight, sweet fruit, which will fully ripen even in not particularly warm conditions. Colour of skin dark green, flesh bright orange. Ripens early, aromatic.
Type: cantaloupe

Explanations
Conservation Breeding: For this variety Sativa practices conservation breeding in Rheinau. To ensure high-quality varieties, they must be maintained. They are regularly replicated and selected by their positive characteristics. In doing so the varieties are continually improved and adapted to growing conditions.

Additional XPath Data 2:
SUGAR BABY
me23
If sown in April, a number of deliciously sweet watemelons will ripen by the end of August. Flesh red. Smallish fruit between 2-3 kg in weight.
Type: watermelon
